${ModID}:SelectionToken.NAME: Bug
${ModID}:SelectionToken.FLAVOR: Congratulations, you've found a secret bug.

${ModID}:aug_akabeko.NAME: Augmented Akabeko
DESCRIPTIONS: Your first Attack each combat deals #b%d additional damage.

${ModID}:aug_bloodvial.NAME: Augmented Blood Vial
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, heal #b%d HP.

${ModID}:aug_bagofmarbles.NAME: Augmented Bag of Marbles
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b%d #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:aug_centennialpuzzle.NAME: Augmented Centennial Puzzle
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you are attacked this combat, draw #b%d cards.

${ModID}:aug_ceramicfish.NAME: Augmented Ceramic Fish
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain #b%d #yGold [REMOVE_SPACE].

${ModID}:aug_mawbank.NAME: Augmented Maw Bank
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b%d #yGold [REMOVE_SPACE]. No longer works when you spend any #yGold at the shop.

${ModID}:aug_mealticket.NAME: Augmented Meal Ticket
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop room, heal #b%d HP.

${ModID}:blackbirdwings.NAME: Blackbird's Wings
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw or discard a card, gain #b1 #y${ModID}:Evasion
